INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Large decrease of the concentrations of dronedarone due to increase of its metabolism, without significant modification of the active metabolite
Increase of the effect of the vitamin K antagonist and of the risk of hemorrhage
INTERACTION.COMMENT: More frequent testing of the INR. Possible adjustment of the dosage of the vitamin K antagonist during the treatment with the dronedarone and a week after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Doubling of the plasma concentrations of dabigatran, with increase of the risk of bleeding

Depression of autoregulation (excessive bradycardia) and disorders of atrioventricular conduction. In addition, increase of the digoxinemia due to decrease of the metabolism of the digoxin. Clinical monitoring and EKG.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Reduce the doses of digoxin by half.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of bradycardia or of atrioventricular block, especially with older patients. Furthermore, slight increase of the concentrations of dronedarone due to decrease of its metabolism by the calcium channel blocker
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Start the treatment with the calcium channel blocker with minimum recommended dosages, and adjust the doses according to the EKG.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the toxicity of the docetaxel due to decrease of its metabolism.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and possible adjustment of the dosage of the docetaxel during the treatment with the enzyme inhibitor.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of fidaxomicin.
Large increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to decrease of its metabolism
Large increase of the concentrations of drodedarone due to decrease of its metabolism
Large decrease of the concentrations of dronedarone due to increase of its metabolism, without significant modification of the active metabolite
Increase of the concentrations of dronedarone due to inhibition of its metabolism by the grapefruit
Risk of bradycardia or of atrioventricular block, especially with older patients. Furthermore, slight increase of the concentrations of dronedarone due to decrease of its metabolism by the quinidine
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Start the treatment with the quinidine at the minimum recommended dosages, and adjust the doses according to the EKG.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Large decrease of the concentrations of dronedarone due to increase of its metabolism, without significant modification of the active metabolite.
Increased risk of undesirable effects (concentration-dependent) of the rhabdomyolysis type (decrease of the hepatic metabolism of the simvastatin)

Risk of bradycardia or of atrioventricular block, especially with older patients. Furthermore, slight increase of the concentrations of dronedarone due to decrease of its metabolism by the calcium channel blocker
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Start the treatment by the calcium channel blocker with the lowest recommended dosages, and adjust the doses according to the EKG.
